title: Third school hit in four days: Israeli airstrike on Gaza shelter kills 30, injures many
content: An Israeli airstrike targeted a Gaza City school serving as a shelter, killing at least 30 people and injuring many others. This incident is the third such attack on schools within four days, primarily affecting women and children. The Israeli military claimed the strike targeted Hamas command centres, while international law experts highlight the responsibility of protecting civilians amid accusations of using human shields.
summary: An Israeli airstrike targeted a Gaza City school serving as a shelter, killing at least 30 people and injuring many others. This incident is the third such attack on schools within four days, primarily affecting women and children. The Israeli military claimed the strike targeted Hamas command centres, while international law experts highlight the responsibility of protecting civilians amid accusations of using human shields.

title: ‘Such a consequential president’: Nancy Pelosi says US should add Joe Biden to Mount Rushmore
'Don't assume everything is okay': Harry and Meghan on 'protecting' their children
content: In a formal interview on CBS News, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle discussed the online threats children face, drawing from their own experiences. They recently launched The Parents Network to support parents dealing with these issues. They emphasised the urgent need for awareness and first responders among parents to prevent tragedies related to social media use and online bullying.
summary: In a formal interview on CBS News, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle discussed the online threats children face, drawing from their own experiences. They recently launched The Parents Network to support parents dealing with these issues. They emphasised the urgent need for awareness and first responders among parents to prevent tragedies related to social media use and online bullying.

title: North Korea deploys hundreds of new missile launchers at border
content: North Korea deployed 250 new mobile launchers for ballistic missiles, capable of nuclear strikes on South Korea and US bases. The rockets, transferred to frontline units amid a ceremony, add to Pyongyang's military threats. North Korea faces accusations of supplying weapons to Russia, while recent floods contribute to food insecurity in the country.
summary: North Korea deployed 250 new mobile launchers for ballistic missiles, capable of nuclear strikes on South Korea and US bases. The rockets, transferred to frontline units amid a ceremony, add to Pyongyang's military threats. North Korea faces accusations of supplying weapons to Russia, while recent floods contribute to food insecurity in the country.

title: 'Extreme ideologies': Australia raises terror threat level to 'probable' from 'possible'
content: Australia raised its terror threat level from 'possible' to 'probable' following increased extremist views and violence. Prime Minister Albanese reassured that there's no immediate attack threat. The heightened alert stems from global tensions, notably the Israel-Hamas conflict. Recent violent incidents, including a Sydney knife attack, were cited as motivations behind the alert change.
summary: Australia raised its terror threat level from 'possible' to 'probable' following increased extremist views and violence. Prime Minister Albanese reassured that there's no immediate attack threat. The heightened alert stems from global tensions, notably the Israel-Hamas conflict. Recent violent incidents, including a Sydney knife attack, were cited as motivations behind the alert change.

title: 'Just give me my money' TikTok trend explained: Why it's taking over social media
Watch: Dog surfing world championships delight crowds in Pacifica, California
content: The World Championships for Dog Surfing, held in Pacifica, California, gathered skilled canine surfers and their owners for a charitable event. About 15 dogs participated, showcasing their surfing talents. Originating in 2006, the sport has grown globally, and TCB Cafe Publishing now plans to expand the competition internationally, inviting local surf and pet groups to join.
summary: The World Championships for Dog Surfing, held in Pacifica, California, gathered skilled canine surfers and their owners for a charitable event. About 15 dogs participated, showcasing their surfing talents. Originating in 2006, the sport has grown globally, and TCB Cafe Publishing now plans to expand the competition internationally, inviting local surf and pet groups to join.

title: Tropical storm Debby threatens Florida's Gulf Coast with historic rainfall and major flooding
US election: Kamala Harris to interview these three candidates at her home for vice president pick
content: Vice President Kamala Harris to interview three potential running mates, Pennsylvania governor Josh Shapiro, Minnesota governor Tim Walz, and Arizona senator Mark Kelly. Harris's choice will significantly influence the Democratic Party's direction. Criticisms of Shapiro and Kelly by progressive and labour groups were noted. Harris aims to combat Donald Trump in the November election, and her decision will be announced soon.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris to interview three potential running mates, Pennsylvania governor Josh Shapiro, Minnesota governor Tim Walz, and Arizona senator Mark Kelly. Harris's choice will significantly influence the Democratic Party's direction. Criticisms of Shapiro and Kelly by progressive and labour groups were noted. Harris aims to combat Donald Trump in the November election, and her decision will be announced soon.

Frontier Airlines flight from Houston to Dallas canceled after Pilot arrest
content: A Frontier Airlines flight from Houston to Dallas was canceled after the pilot, Seymour Walker, was arrested for an assault-family violence warrant. Passengers saw Walker being escorted off the plane by three officers. The airline offered affected passengers refunds, credit, or re-accommodation on another flight later that evening, along with a $100 flight voucher.
summary: A Frontier Airlines flight from Houston to Dallas was canceled after the pilot, Seymour Walker, was arrested for an assault-family violence warrant. Passengers saw Walker being escorted off the plane by three officers. The airline offered affected passengers refunds, credit, or re-accommodation on another flight later that evening, along with a $100 flight voucher.

title: 'Imagine the guilt': Nancy Pelosi opens up about husband's attack, reflects on political legacy
content: Nancy Pelosi discussed the traumatic attack on her husband, Paul Pelosi, in which he was severely injured. Both have avoided discussing the event as advised by doctors. Pelosi's book, "The Art of Power," addresses her political career and family perspectives. She also denied pressuring President Joe Biden to drop out of his re-election campaign and offered advice for Kamala Harris whom she had publicly endorsed earlier.
summary: Nancy Pelosi discussed the traumatic attack on her husband, Paul Pelosi, in which he was severely injured. Both have avoided discussing the event as advised by doctors. Pelosi's book, "The Art of Power," addresses her political career and family perspectives. She also denied pressuring President Joe Biden to drop out of his re-election campaign and offered advice for Kamala Harris whom she had publicly endorsed earlier.
